titles.title: To exempt certain individuals who were 65 years of age or older as of the date of the enactment of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1993 from changes made by the Act in the Medicare secondary payer rules for individuals with end stage renal disease.

bill.summary: 9/29/1997--Introduced. Exempts certain individuals who were 65 years of age or older as of the date of enactment of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1993 from changes made by that Act in the Medicare secondary payer rules for individuals with end stage renal disease. Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide for retrospective payment adjustments to such individuals (and their insurers and health care providers) who apply for them within 90 days after enactment of this Act.
